entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:47 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 11:33 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: SSW 32 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
